name: The Shawshank Redemption
bio: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Godfather
bio: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: The Godfather: Part II
bio: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

name: The Dark Knight
bio: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

name: 12 Angry Men
bio: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

name: Schindler's List
bio: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
bio: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: Pulp Fiction
bio: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
bio: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
bio: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Fight Club
bio: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

name: Forrest Gump
bio: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: Inception
bio: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
bio: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
bio: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

name: The Matrix
bio: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

name: Goodfellas
bio: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
bio: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

name: Shichinin no samurai
bio: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

name: Se7en
bio: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: La vita è bella
bio: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

name: Cidade de Deus
bio: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
bio: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

name: It's a Wonderful Life
bio: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

name: Star Wars
bio: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

name: Saving Private Ryan
bio: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: The Green Mile
bio: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
bio: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

name: Interstellar
bio: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: Gisaengchung
bio: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: Léon
bio: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

name: Seppuku
bio: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

name: The Usual Suspects
bio: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

name: The Lion King
bio: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

name: The Pianist
bio: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

name: Back to the Future
bio: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
bio: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

name: American History X
bio: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

name: Modern Times
bio: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

name: Gladiator
bio: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: Psycho
bio: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

name: The Departed
bio: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

name: City Lights
bio: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

name: The Intouchables
bio: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

name: Whiplash
bio: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

name: Hotaru no haka
bio: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

name: The Prestige
bio: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
bio: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

name: Casablanca
bio: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
bio: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: Rear Window
bio: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

name: Alien
bio: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

name: Apocalypse Now
bio: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

name: Memento
bio: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

name: The Great Dictator
bio: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
bio: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

name: Django Unchained
bio: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

name: Hamilton
bio: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

name: The Lives of Others
bio: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: Paths of Glory
bio: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

name: Joker
bio: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

name: WALL·E
bio: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

name: The Shining
bio: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

name: Avengers: Infinity War
bio: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

name: Sunset Blvd.
bio: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

name: Witness for the Prosecution
bio: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

name: Oldeuboi
bio: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

name: Mononoke-hime
bio: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
bio: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
bio: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
bio: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

name: Once Upon a Time in America
bio: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

name: Kimi no na wa.
bio: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

name: Aliens
bio: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

name: Coco
bio: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

name: Avengers: Endgame
bio: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

name: American Beauty
bio: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

name: Capharnaüm
bio: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

name: Braveheart
bio: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

name: Das Boot
bio: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

name: Toy Story
bio: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

name: 3 Idiots
bio: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Tengoku to jigoku
bio: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

name: Amadeus
bio: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

name: Inglourious Basterds
bio: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
bio: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

name: Good Will Hunting
bio: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: Taare Zameen Par
bio: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Reservoir Dogs
bio: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
bio: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

name: Requiem for a Dream
bio: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

name: Vertigo
bio: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
bio: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

name: Jagten
bio: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
bio: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

name: Citizen Kane
bio: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

name: Dangal
bio: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

name: Singin' in the Rain
bio: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

name: Ladri di biciclette
bio: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

name: Full Metal Jacket
bio: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

name: The Kid
bio: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

name: Idi i smotri
bio: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

name: Snatch
bio: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

name: North by Northwest
bio: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

name: A Clockwork Orange
bio: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

name: Scarface
bio: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

name: Ikiru
bio: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

name: Taxi Driver
bio: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

name: Incendies
bio: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

name: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
bio: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

name: Lawrence of Arabia
bio: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

name: Toy Story 3
bio: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

name: The Sting
bio: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

name: Amélie
bio: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

name: Metropolis
bio: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

name: Per qualche dollaro in più
bio: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

name: The Apartment
bio: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

name: Double Indemnity
bio: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
bio: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

name: Up
bio: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
bio: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

name: Heat
bio: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

name: L.A. Confidential
bio: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

name: Die Hard
bio: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

name: Green Book
bio: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
bio: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

name: Batman Begins
bio: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

name: Yôjinbô
bio: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

name: Rashômon
bio: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

name: Der Untergang
bio: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

name: Bacheha-Ye aseman
bio: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

name: Unforgiven
bio: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

name: Ran
bio: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

name: Some Like It Hot
bio: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
bio: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

name: All About Eve
bio: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

name: Casino
bio: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

name: A Beautiful Mind
bio: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
bio: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

name: The Great Escape
bio: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

name: Pan's Labyrinth
bio: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

name: El secreto de sus ojos
bio: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

name: There Will Be Blood
bio: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
bio: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

name: Judgment at Nuremberg
bio: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

name: Tonari no Totoro
bio: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

name: Raging Bull
bio: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
bio: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

name: Dial M for Murder
bio: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
bio: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

name: Shutter Island
bio: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

name: The Gold Rush
bio: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

name: Chinatown
bio: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

name: Babam ve Oglum
bio: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

name: No Country for Old Men
bio: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

name: V for Vendetta
bio: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

name: Inside Out
bio: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

name: The Elephant Man
bio: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

name: The Thing
bio: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

name: Det sjunde inseglet
bio: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

name: Warrior
bio: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

name: The Sixth Sense
bio: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

name: Jurassic Park
bio: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

name: Trainspotting
bio: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

name: Klaus
bio: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

name: The Truman Show
bio: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

name: Gone with the Wind
bio: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

name: Finding Nemo
bio: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

name: Stalker
bio: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

name: Smultronstället
bio: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

name: Blade Runner
bio: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
bio: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

name: Salinui chueok
bio: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
bio: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.

name: Fargo
bio: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

name: Ratsasan
bio: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

name: Room
bio: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

name: Relatos salvajes
bio: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

name: Gran Torino
bio: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

name: The Third Man
bio: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

name: Tôkyô monogatari
bio: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

name: On the Waterfront
bio: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

name: The Deer Hunter
bio: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

name: In the Name of the Father
bio: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Mary and Max
bio: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
bio: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

name: Before Sunrise
bio: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

name: Gone Girl
bio: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

name: Catch Me If You Can
bio: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

name: Hacksaw Ridge
bio: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

name: Prisoners
bio: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

name: Anand
bio: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

name: Persona
bio: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

name: Andhadhun
bio: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

name: Sherlock Jr.
bio: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

name: The Big Lebowski
bio: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

name: Höstsonaten
bio: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

name: To Be or Not to Be
bio: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

name: The General
bio: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

name: Barry Lyndon
bio: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
bio: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: Ford v Ferrari
bio: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

name: Eskiya
bio: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

name: 12 Years a Slave
bio: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

name: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
bio: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
bio: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

name: Dead Poets Society
bio: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

name: Million Dollar Baby
bio: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

name: Network
bio: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

name: Stand by Me
bio: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
bio: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

name: Ben-Hur
bio: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
bio: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

name: Soul
bio: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

name: Cool Hand Luke
bio: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

name: Ah-ga-ssi
bio: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

name: Platoon
bio: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

name: Logan
bio: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

name: Into the Wild
bio: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

name: Rush
bio: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

name: Le salaire de la peur
bio: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

name: Life of Brian
bio: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

name: La haine
bio: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

name: Les quatre cents coups
bio: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

name: Spotlight
bio: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
bio: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

name: Hotel Rwanda
bio: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

name: Amores perros
bio: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
bio: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Andrei Rublev
bio: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

name: Rocky
bio: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

name: Monsters, Inc.
bio: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

name: Kaze no tani no Naushika
bio: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

name: Dom za vesanje
bio: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

name: Rebecca
bio: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

name: Before Sunset
bio: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

name: Rang De Basanti
bio: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

name: Du rififi chez les hommes
bio: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

name: Fa yeung nin wah
bio: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

name: Paris, Texas
bio: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

name: It Happened One Night
bio: A renegade reporter and a crazy young heiress meet on a bus heading for New York, and end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

name: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
bio: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

name: Drishyam
bio: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Drishyam
bio: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

name: Koe no katachi
bio: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

name: Contratiempo
bio: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

name: La battaglia di Algeri
bio: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

name: The Help
bio: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Mandariinid
bio: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.
